On August 25, 2025, On August 25, 2025,Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)assisted ICICI Lombard in establishing a fully automated multi-region disaster recovery (DR) on the AWS Cloud . This development positioned ICICI Lombard as one of the pioneering insurance firms in India to attain fully automated multi-region resilience on the AWS Cloud. The DR solution was implemented with an emphasis on automation and an "infrastructure-as-code" methodology to ensure business continuity, utilizing AWS-native technologies for automated failover with minimal manual intervention.

Additional corporate news for TCS on August 25, 2025, included meetings with analysts and institutional investors.
